2081.verse: يَوْمَ|(On) the Day|107|118|1057$يَدْعُوكُمْ|He will call you|118|139|3388$فَتَسْتَجِيبُونَ|and you will respond|155|176|10400$بِحَمْدِهِۦ|with His Praise,|121|142|9377$وَتَظُنُّونَ|and you will think,|140|150|10401$إِن|not|44|96|225$لَّبِثْتُمْ|you had remained|137|241|10402$إِلَّا|except|65|169|86$قَلِيلاً|a little (while).|117|169|433$

2083.verse: رَّبُّكُمْ|Your Lord|83|90|3243$أَعْلَمُ|(is) most knowing|137|150|324$بِكُمْ‌ۖ|of you.|67|80|2564$إِن|If|44|57|225$يَشَأْ|He wills,|74|87|4532$يَرْحَمْكُمْ|He will have mercy on you;|200|213|10405$أَوْ|or|41|48|154$إِن|if|44|61|225$يَشَأْ|He wills|69|103|4532$يُعَذِّبْكُمْ‌ۚ|He will punish you.|143|177|7580$وَمَآ|And not|72|106|46$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|We have sent you|141|175|1101$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them|87|104|22$وَكِيلاً|(as) a guardian.|126|126|4237$

2084.verse: وَرَبُّكَ|And your Lord|112|121|4866$أَعْلَمُ|(is) most knowing|137|156|324$بِمَن|of whoever|94|113|10199$فِى|(is) in|58|77|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|134|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۗ|and the earth.|116|125|352$وَلَقَدْ|And verily|85|100|640$فَضَّلْنَا|We have preferred|143|172|2249$بَعْضَ|some|76|105|2330$ٱلنَّبِيِّــۧنَ|(of) the Prophets|135|164|611$عَلَىٰ|to|63|92|52$بَعْضٍ‌ۖ|others.|76|91|1316$وَءَاتَيْنَا|And We gave|108|210|830$دَاوُۥدَ|Dawood|78|282|4647$زَبُورًا|Zaboor.|81|183|4648$

2085.verse: قُلِ|Say,|50|70|1922$ٱدْعُواْ|"Call|76|115|6460$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|139|20$زَعَمْتُم|you claimed|98|137|5852$مِّن دُونِهِۦ|besides Him,|116|155|4463$فَلَا|[then] not|89|109|208$يَمْلِكُونَ|they have power|132|160|9394$كَشْفَ|(to) remove|99|154|10406$ٱلضُّرِّ|the misfortunes|123|178|10407$عَنكُمْ|from you|78|134|507$وَلَا|and not|71|99|25$تَحْوِيلاً|(to) transfer (it)."|139|139|10408$

2086.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|90|51$ٱلَّذِينَ|whom|70|86|20$يَدْعُونَ|they call,|87|104|1942$يَبْتَغُونَ|seek|88|104|4716$إِلَىٰ|to|53|70|118$رَبِّهِمُ|their Lord|83|100|10409$ٱلْوَسِيلَةَ|the means of access,|163|171|4943$أَيُّهُمْ|which of them|114|135|2859$أَقْرَبُ|(is) nearest,|102|144|2126$وَيَرْجُونَ|and they hope|116|158|10410$رَحْمَتَهُۥ|(for) His mercy|119|161|10411$وَيَخَافُونَ|and fear|106|127|9430$عَذَابَهُۥٓ‌ۚ|His punishment.|124|130|10412$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|147|1786$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|125|1322$كَانَ|is|57|70|913$مَحْذُورًا|(ever) feared.|113|120|10413$

2080.verse: Or [any] creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon -

2081.verse: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained [in the world] except for a little."

2082.verse: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces [dissension] among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy.

2083.verse: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a manager.

2084.verse: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others [in various ways], and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].

2085.verse: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed [as gods] besides Him, for they do not possess the [ability for] removal of adversity from you or [for its] transfer [to someone else]."

2086.verse: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, [striving as to] which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared.

2087.verse: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed.
